content: Mentioning the Nazis isn't allowed? This isn't stated anywhere, and it's not inflammatory, nor is it stating that someone was defending the Nazis. It's the simplest method of taking a Western audience and highlighting a flaw in logic.
Don't just ban me again, because there's no reason to waste your entire day banning alts. We should discuss this.
This is going to be really heavily time-wasting for everyone.
I for one prefer high-brow, on-topic trolling.
This could take all day and be a great list of puns, or it could be a real discussion. Moderation will decide with its actions.

Convenein Sanity said:

This could take all day and be a great list of puns, or it could be a real discussion. Moderation will decide with its actions.

If you would like to continue your conversation do so by emailing rust-mods@rust-lang.org
Did any core team member actually reply to the previous discussion, or was it only hopeless white brogrammers?
What a great way to demonstrate the banning was the right choice
More time wasted. Every second is irrecoverable.
We could be spending these hours on proving safety, for example.
Instead, an invisible technician who values none of their time or effort is attempting to prove their superiority through force.
This person probably agrees that police should not do the same thing.
No criminal ever changed their mind after a beating.
One might wonder if recidivism increases as corporal punishment increases, and one would be right.
